Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Quality Suites Lyon 7 Lodge places you in the heart of Lyon, convenient to Ecole Normale Superieure de Lyon and Stade Gerland. This 4-star residence is within close proximity of Halle Tony Garnier and Centre d'Histoire de la Resistance et de la Deportation.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 97 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the residence's room service (during limited hours).

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and multilingual staff. Event facilities at this residence consist of meeting rooms and a meeting room. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
Take advantage of the residence's room service (during limited hours).
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.
Make yourself at home in one of the 97 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and microwaves. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

A stay at Quality Suites Lyon 7 Lodge places you in the heart of Lyon, convenient to Ecole Normale Superieure de Lyon and Stade Gerland. This 4-star residence is within close proximity of Halle Tony Garnier and Centre d'Histoire de la Resistance et de la Deportation.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Ecole Normale Superieure de Lyon - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Halle Tony Garnier - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Centre d'Histoire de la Resistance et de la Deportation - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Lyon Confluence Shopping Center - 1 km / 0.7 mi
Confluence Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Confluence Museum - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
La Sucriere - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Confluence Vaporetto Stop - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Place Carnot - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
University of Lyon II - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Stade Gerland - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Gerland Sports Palace - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Textile Museum - 1.7 km / 1 mi
Lyon Aquarium - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Saint Martin d'Ainay Abbey - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi

The nearest airports are:
Lyon (XYD-Part-Dieu SNCF Train Station) - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Lyon (LYN-Lyon Bron) - 8.4 km / 5.2 mi
Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery) - 18.8 km / 11.7 mi

The preferred airport for Quality Suites Lyon 7 Lodge is Lyon (LYS-Saint-Exupery).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
